text: Großheubach (or Grossheubach) is a market community in the Miltenberg district in the Lower Franconia region in Bavaria, Germany. == Geography == === Place === Großheubach is on the right edge of the Main. The community is on the slopes of the Mittelgebirge Spessart. The highest point in the municipal area is the 439 m-high Ospisrain. Großheubach is on the Fränkischer Rotwein Wanderweg ("Franconian Red Wine Hiking Trail"). Across the Main are the hills of the Odenwald. ===Subdivisions=== The hamlets of Klotzenhof and Roßhof are part of the municipality Großheubach. == References == == Other websites == * * Municipal website Category:Miltenberg (district)
title: Großheubach
